content: Stabilizer X-6-SL ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Accessories for tools > Accessories for direct fastening ### FEATURES:Features Higher fastening quality – makes it easier to hold powder-actuated tools perpendicular to the work surface Easy to attach/remove – can be removed for improved access to tight spaces Robust construction – engineered to last longer and work more reliably under real jobsite conditions Low weight – preserves the well-balanced ergonomics of the fastening tool Made from natural rubber – free from critical substances Applications Stabilizing and guiding nailers to improve fastening quality ### TECHNICAL DATA: ### ITEMS- 2229109 - Stabilizer X-6-SL - Package Size 1 pc
